titles.title: Income Equity Act of 1993
To increase the minimum wage and to deny employers a deduction for payments of excessive compensation.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E2416)
Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.
Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Education and Labor

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Labor Standards, Occupational Health and Safety.

committee.name: House Education and Labor
committee.subcommittee: Labor Standards, Occupational Health and Safety

bill.summary: 10/13/1993--Introduced. Income Equity Act of 1993 - Amends the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to increase the minimum wage from $4.25 to $6.50 an hour. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to deny employers a deduction for payments of excessive compensation (more than 25 times the lowest compensation paid any other employee).
